Summary: It was sitting low in the sky near Michigan and Schaefer then began to move sw then disappeared. I have photos.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Dearborn
There were no other sightings in Dearborn on or around November 7th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were leaving krogers on michigan and greenfield, riding with my mom sister and son. We got to Schaefer and my mom, the driver said omg what are those three lights in the sky just sitting there they're really low. It was not too far from Pizza Hut when I looked up and seen it and started snapping pics then it got higher in the sky and moved quickly sw. We made a U turn before Wyoming right by the 94 free way when we went back all we saw were regular lights in the sky light helicopters and airplanes. Once I zoom on on the pictures it appears to be 4 light like it changed from one big object to the 4 smaller ones.
